model_input:
[Task Description]
You will be given DIALOGUE CONTEXT and MEMORY.
Your job is to judge if MEMORY contains helpful past information for a language model, representing Unknown, to generate a proper next response based on DIALOGUE CONTEXT.

If the DIALOUGE CONTEXT does not require the model to utilize past information for response generation, say "N/A".
Say "Yes" if MEMORY contains such helpful information and say "No" if it dose not.
Provide a brief explanation for your judgement.

[Format Regulation]
Generate your output below OUTPUT using the following format:
Brief explanation: your explanation
Judgement: "Yes", "No", or "N/A"

[Task]
DIALOGUE CONTEXT:
Athlete: Ted Athlete unrolls the map. He looks at it for a few moments before tracing his finger along one of the highways. "This is our route," he says finally, feeling in control.

[MEMORY]
User Description:
Coach is a dedicated coach who is focused on helping Athlete improve their performance. Coach is knowledgeable about nutrition and emphasizes the importance of a healthy diet for athletes. Coach is also supportive of Athlete's efforts and encourages them to keep working hard.

Relationship Description:
Coach and Athlete have a supportive and respectful relationship. Coach provides guidance and advice to Athlete, who is grateful for the support. Athlete trusts Coach's expertise and values their encouragement.

Event Description:
The events shared by Coach and Athlete include discussions about the taste of gum, the benefits of incorporating bean sprouts into the diet, and Athlete's improvements in performance. Coach advises Athlete on pre-game meals and hydration, while Athlete expresses gratitude for Coach's guidance. Athlete's energy levels have improved since eating bean sprouts, and Coach is proud of Athlete's incredible performance. Both Coach and Athlete are focused on achieving success and continuously improving.
